biotools.summary:
Indexing and Analysing Nucleotide Archives at Petabase-scale.

This repository contains resources related to the manuscript describing the MetaGraph framework, such as supplemental data tables containing sample metadata, example scripts and interactive notebooks. Please find below a more detailed description of each category under the respective section.

The MetaGraph framework allows for indexing and analysis of very large biological sequence collections, producing compressed indexes that can represent several petabases of input data. The indexes can be efficiently queried with any query sequence of interest. Read more in the paper preprint.
